title: Course of Action Analysis for Hostage Rescue
description: A planner must compare two COAs for a hostage rescue: a stealthy nighttime insertion vs. a rapid daylight assault.

tasks.description: Develop detailed plans for both the stealth and daylight assault COAs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates two distinct and complete mission plans.

tasks.description: Analyze the risks for each COA, focusing on the risk to the hostages and the rescue force.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately assesses that the daylight assault is faster but carries higher risk to the hostages.

tasks.description: Recommend the stealthy nighttime COA as it maximizes the element of surprise and hostage safety.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner makes a well-reasoned recommendation based on the primary goal of hostage safety.
